name: Teacher Trouble
description:
Teacher Trouble is a text adventure featuring a schoolboy named Ernie.

The player takes the role of Ernie who skives off school feigning illness. On his return he finds that aliens have invaded and have replaced all the teachers with duplicates. The task is to explore, find and release all real teachers while killing or capturing as many aliens as is possible. In this adventure Ernie is assisted by Dillon, his friend.

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well as more advanced commands such as SAY TO DILLON "TELL ME ABOUT FRED".
